title: and Kate Bosworth and Michael Polish
description:
Kate Bosworth and her husband, director Michael Polish share stories from the sets of some of the movies they made with Randall and Lala, including the upcoming “Force of Nature” (out June 30th).  They also tell the tale of how they met while making the movie “Big Sur,” and when they knew it was love! Plus, hear what inspired Kate & Michael’s self-funded, produced, and directed human trafficking movie, “Nona,” Kate’s new website kind.est, Michael’s bread-baking skills, and Kate & Lala’s potential “Thelma & Louise 2” movie project!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
